attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Get George Lamb off 6 Music!

The BBC as a public service is duty bound to listen to it's shareholders i.e it's listeners.

With over 3000 signatures on other unofficial bodies - surely it is time for the BBC to listen to it's listeners and bring choice and personalisation into it's operations.

The undersigned petition the Prime Minister to build licence payers choice and personalisation into the operations of the BBC.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
